definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: The structure variance of soil nutrient is bigger than the random variance.
sentences.chinese: 毛竹林土壤養分的結構性變異大於隨機變異。

sentences.english: On the other side of the brook, there are many trees. There are lots of green bamboo groves.
sentences.chinese: 在小河的一邊有許多樹木，還有一片翠綠的竹林。

sentences.english: Guangxi native Ye Yaliang manages a bamboo forest that produces large, sweet bamboo shoots.
sentences.chinese: 阿亮是廣西人，他的竹林裏生長的是大頭甜筍。

sentences.english: I woke up from a dream to walk through the bamboo forest, can not help but feel sad and dreary up.
sentences.chinese: 我從夢中醒來漫步於竹林之間，心裏不禁悲涼起來。

sentences.english: The illuminated rods inside the China Pavilion represent a bamboo forest.
sentences.chinese: 中國館中發光的的枝條表現出一片竹林。

sentences.english: Some problems of bamboo management, processing and utilization were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對當前竹林管理，加工利用中存在問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: Over the high banks, the cottage roofs and the tops of the bamboo clumps are visible.
sentences.chinese: 高高的河岸上，竹林梢頭農舍的屋頂隱約可見。

sentences.english: Having a rest in the bamboo forest behind Village Wang Gong Keng.
sentences.chinese: 王公坑村背竹林下休息一會。

sentences.english: Forest includes arbor forest and bamboo forest.
sentences.chinese: 森林，包括喬木林和竹林。

sentences.english: Pandas, for whom bamboo is the main food, like to live in bamboo forests.
sentences.chinese: 竹子爲食的熊貓喜歡居住在竹林中。

sentences.english: Bamboo placed in the stone, it is best to choose a good shape can be highly ornamental stones.
sentences.chinese: 竹林裏擺石，最好選用造型好可賞性強的石頭。

sentences.english: I have heard that on one occasion the Blessed One was staying in Rajagaha at the Bamboo Grove, the Squirrels' Sanctuary.
sentences.chinese: 如是我聞，一時薄伽梵住王舍城竹林的松鼠園。

sentences.english: The paper systematically discussed the living environment and investigated the area of bamboo and the growing situation and other parameter.
sentences.chinese: 統計了冶勒自然保護區竹林面積及生長情況等指標。

sentences.english: The Hu-Du bamboo forests were famous ancient ecological resources in the Wei River area.
sentences.chinese: 鄠杜竹林是古渭河流域的著名生態資源。

sentences.english: The lush bamboo groves remember the first time she went digging bamboo shoots with her brother.
sentences.chinese: 那些翠綠的竹林記着查利雲第一次跟哥哥去挖竹筍。

sentences.english: The natural and geographical conditions in Yaan city of Sichuan Provinces are very suitable for the growth of bamboos.
sentences.chinese: 四川省雅安市的自然地理條件非常適合竹林的生長。

definition: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
verdant/lush green and full of life
